quotes.quote: There is a difference between being poor and being broke. Broke is temporary, and poor is eternal.
Being broke is a temporary situation. Being poor is a state of mind.
People who go broke in a big way never miss any meals. It is the poor jerk who is shy a half slug who must tighten his belt.
Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.
When everybody has got money they cut taxes, and when they're broke they raise 'em. That's statesmanship of the highest order.
Being broke is not a disgrace, it is only a catastrophe.
He broke through the barriers of the skies.
What we're trying to do is get things fixed, not allow them to stay broke.
If someone broke your heart it doesn't mean you should build a wall around it and quit loving. Redirect your love.
Acting makes me feel broke again, it makes me feel unaccomplished.
Broke people giving financial advice is like a shop teacher with missing fingers.
Being mature is when you finally grow enough, to be able to joke about the things that once broke you as a person.
If you're planning only to make money and nothing else, you'll be broke.
Being broke is a very efficient educational agency.
Go for broke. Always try and do too much. Dispense with safety nets. Take a deep breath before you begin
No one ever went broke by taking a profit.
When you're going broke, it's best to have a great time.
Nobody has ever gone broke selling escape to the American public.
You have to go broke three times to learn how to make a living.
Being broke didn't seem so awful as it had yesterday, being broke but being at peace with the world.
If you're broke, you don't want to rap about being broke; you gonna rap about hustling and getting that bread.
Poor is a state of mind. Broke is a state of wallet. You can fix being broke; it's not so easy to fix being poor.
If no one ever broke the rules, then we'd never advance.
If you're perpetually broke, you should be working hard at overcoming stupidity and not getting rich.
Broke people talk about people and problems. Rich people talk about ideas and goals. Your conversation chooses your destiny.
The only excuse for being broke is being in Jail.

Lost motivation means that you broke promises to yourself and haven't corrected them yet. You need to believe in yourself again. This can only happen when you start fulfilling the small promises you make to yourself.
The lack of money is the root of all evil.
